page.title: 16Body in the Bog
page.content: Sara Slack Age 9 My Dad Edward Slack works at a peat farm. When Dad was milling the peat he saw a Â£thing', his mate threw it at him. He thought that it was a piece of wood. Dad looked carefully and realized that it was part of a leg and foot. It was brown with a toe nail still on, bones were sticking out of the toes. Dad sent for the police. A week later they found the rest of the body sticking out of the peat. On Saturday I went to work with my Dad and I saw the body in the bog. It was horrible . It is now in the British Museum. They think he was 20 yrs when he was strangled. His body is about 2,500 years old.
